Body.Content:
We are launching the ability Enable dark mode in Power Automate for desktop for Power Automate. With this feature, you can switch between default and dark modes in Power Automate for desktop to enhance user experience. This feature will reach general availability on April 30, 2025.

How does this affect me?
Users can configure Power Automate for desktop to use light or dark mode.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate â€“ Enable dark mode in Power Automate for desktop
